Package controller

package controller
The controller package serves as the core of the application, managing the flow of data between the model and view components in the MVC architecture.

This package contains classes that handle user actions, manage schema processing, and control the application lifecycle.

Key classes include:

  • SchemaRunner: The entry point for the application. It initializes the JavaFX application lifecycle and sets up the MVC components.
  • SchemaController: Acts as the controller in the MVC architecture, managing interactions between SchemaModel and SchemaView. It handles schema file uploads, parsing, and SQL generation.

Example usage:

     // Start the application
     public static void main(String[] args) {
         SchemaRunner.main(args);
     }

     // Set up the controller
     SchemaController controller = new SchemaController(new SchemaModel(), new SchemaView(stage));
     controller.run();
Since:
1.0

    The SchemaRunner class serves as the entry point for the Schema application.
